alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Laclede; Polk; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 9:09PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL WEBSTER... DALLAS...SOUTHWESTERN LACLEDE AND NORTHEASTERN POLK COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM CDT... At 909 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buffalo, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Bolivar, Bennett Spring State Park, Buffalo, Conway, Polk, Urbana, Phillipsburg, Halfway, Bennett Springs, Louisburg, Windyville, March, Tunas, Pumpkin Center, Foose, Goodson, Plad, Long Lane and Charity. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 106 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
